name: Sky Field
description:
WELCOME TO SKY FIELD

It's a game about collecting the most important things in our modern lives, which is pizza (symbolizing food), wifi (symbolizing internet), joystick (symbolizing games), and bed (symbolizing sleep)

     

But beware of the danger in the sky, they come in different forms, a cow, a meteorite, a tank, UFO, birds, sharks, cars, among many others. 

Note: The pc version is harder + has an extra movement. This game was developed by me, and my two beloved daughters and we truly hope that you guys enjoy!!
